usefulItems: parchment paper, airtight container, cooling rack, large baking sheet, oven
title: Gluten and Grain Free Dinner Rolls

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 350°F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.
Place almonds and psyllium into mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add baking powder and salt and combine <b>Turbo/0.5 sec/4 times<b>.
Add egg whites and vinegar and knead <b>20 sec/<b>.
Add boiling water and knead <b>1 min/<b>. Dough will be sticky but workable with spatula.
Divide dough into 5 equal-sized pieces, form into rolls and place onto prepared baking sheet. Bake 50-55 minutes (350ºF), or until lightly golden.
Allow to cool 5 minutes before transferring to a cooling rack. Serve warm or allow to cool completely (approx. 20 minutes) before transferring to an airtight container until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: To ensure recipe results are truly gluten-free, always check your ingredient labels to ensure traces of wheat or gluten have not been used in the production process.
This recipe will work in a convection oven, but the rolls will not rise as much. A conventional oven setting is recommended.
